description:
Refactor internal/issue/issue.go to add two shared primitives:

1. loadEdges() (forward map[string][]string, reverse map[string][]string) — reads blocks/ dir once, returns adjacency in both directions. Replaces the inline edge-loading in Graph() (lines 559-587) and the per-issue BlockedBy reads in Ready()/Blocked().

2. walkTips(roots []string, edges map[string][]string) []string — walks from roots following the given edge map, returns leaf IDs (nodes with no outgoing open edges). 'Open' means the issue status is not closed. This is the core primitive: show and ready both compose from it.

These replace the existing walkGraph() helper (lines 639-647) which only walks downward and returns all reachable nodes rather than just leaves.

Keep existing public API (Graph, Ready, Blocked, NewlyUnblocked) working during this refactor — they'll be updated in subsequent tasks.
title: Extract shared edge-loading and tip-walking primitives in Store
